Html:
Hello guys,

Mostly, I'm happy user with WPP.
I just have a simple question, then maybe you can help.

I had no issues to distribute any reqular EXE packages, until, I went for the upgrade to the latest release. That was the straight forward overwrite over the old one (as several post suggested).
Then troubles have started.
Due to any distribution of the executables, I always got "Not approved" status.

I had to completely extract the previous release of WPP, we can say, to the fresh folder, to run the app.
Then problem is gone.

What do I do wrong please?
Any suggestions please?
I run several W2012R2 combined with W8.1.

Cheers,
Marek

Bump!!!
Anyone?

Due to the fresh extraction of the latest release to the new folder, I have the same issue with EXE. It is not the issue with the upgrade of overwriting of the older WPP package.
It looks like the problem with Approval, or detection.
Everything works with the older version.

Any suggestions to check please?

Cheers,
Marek
